>>===== MODE =====>>
bibliography
<<===== MODE =====<<

>>===== RESULT =====>>
<div class="csl-bib-body">
  <div class="csl-entry">The Story of Civilization</div>
</div>
<<===== RESULT =====<<

>>===== CSL =====>>

      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"

      version="1.1mlz1">
  <info>
    <id>http://pzotero.com</id>
    <title>another style for test</title>
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>
  <citation>
    <layout locale="en">
        <text variable="title"/>
    </layout>
    <layout locale="de">
        <text variable="title"/>
    </layout>
    <layout>
        <text variable="title"/>
    </layout>
  </citation>
  <bibliography>
    <layout>
        <text variable="title"/>
    </layout>
  </bibliography>
</style>
<<===== CSL =====<<

      "id":"ID-1",
